amendment.description: Relating to the Mental Health Self-Assessment Program of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4231 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4231 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) Relating to the Mental Health Self-Assessment Program of the Department of Defense.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4231 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
